name: Spotlight Reports for Canvas
description: Spotlight Reports allows you to view stats about instructors within a sub-account

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:migrate && bundle exec rake populate_database

OAUTH_KEY.description: A key you'll enter when adding this to Canvas

OAUTH_SECRET.description: A shared secret you'll need when adding this to Canvas

API_URL.description: The URL of your canvas instance, e.g. https://<your-school>.instructure.com

API_TOKEN.description: The API Token you saved (Account => Settings => New Access Token)
